pullRequest.title: [RW-5791][risk=no] Avoid rotating status icon offscreen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: margin-left on the rotating icon went offscreen, causing a horizontal scrollbar to appear.
Fix: put the margin on a container div instead, let the SVG rotate without margin.

nodes.bodyText: There's probably a cleaner way of doing this. I wasn't really able to understand how the  svg was positioning itself relative to the div, and it seemed like I was going down a bit of a rabbit hole. Let me know if you have another idea for achieving this.
